title: Integrated Clinical Decision Making and Management I
description:
This module aims to enhance patient-centred care through acquisition of knowledge of pathophysiology of common problems and conditions, diagnostic investigations and principles of management related to cardiovascular, respiratory and gastrointestinal systems.  It also develops clinical reasoning and health assessment skills, shared decision-making and effective communication

During the work-based practice, students will have the opportunity to further develop and apply knowledge and skills learnt in the module.
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
